titleStmt.title: A treatise of true fortitude. By M. George Gyffard, Preacher of the worde of God, at Maldon in Essex
titleStmt.author: Gifford, George, d. 1620.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by J. Roberts] for Iohn Hardie, and are to be sold at his shop in Paules Church-yard at the signe of the Tygars head,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.

place.placeName: his shop in Paules Church-yard at the signe of the Tygars head
